qas.question: Why is the second timeline needed?

answers.text: second scale shows the most recent eon with an expanded scale

qas.question: Which timeline is further expanded in the fourth scale?
What is the name of the latest epoch?
The Pleistocene epoch takes place during which period?
What does the second timeline compress?
What has the first timeline added to the timeline to expand it?

plausible_answers.text: The second scale compresses the most recent era

qas.question: Why is the most recent era expanded in the first scale?
Where is the Holocene further expanded since it is very short with short epochs?
Why is the Holocene not shown clearly on the first timeline?
Which timeline is the most accurate?

plausible_answers.text: the entire time from the formation of the Earth to the present

qas.question: What does the fourth scale compress?
What is the name of the epoch expanded in the second scale?
